## TerrainTechniqueParams.heightGradientInterpolation property

If `heightBasedColors` is defined, this value defines the interpolation method used to generate the height-based gradient texture (defaults to `Discrete`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
heightGradientInterpolation?: "Discrete" | "Linear" | "Cubic";
```
